00109 # MicropolisView Class
00110 
00111 
00112 class MicropolisView:
00113 
00114     def __init__(
00115             self,
00116             m=None,
00117             x=0,
00118             y=0,
00119             width=micropolisengine.WORLD_W,
00120             height=micropolisengine.WORLD_H,
00121             **args):
00122         self.m = m
00123         self.x = x
00124         self.y = y
00125         self.width = width
00126         self.height = height
00127 
00128 
00129     def applyToClippedTiles(self, onTilesBegin, onRowBegin, onTile, onRowEnd, onTilesEnd):
00130 
00131         left = max(self.x, 0)
00132         top = max(self.y, 0)
00133         right = min(self.x + self.width, micropolisengine.WORLD_W)
00134         bottom = min(self.y + self.height, micropolisengine.WORLD_H)
00135 
00136         w = right - left
00137         h = bottom - top
00138 
00139         onTilesBegin(left, top, right, bottom, w, h)
00140 
00141         if (w != 0) and (h != 0):
00142 
00143             getTile = self.m.getTile
00144             lowMask = micropolisengine.LOMASK
00145             flagsMask = ~lowMask
00146 
00147             for y in range(top, bottom):
00148                 onRowBegin(y, w, h)
00149                 for x in range(left, right):
00150                     rawTile = getTile(x, y)
00151                     onTile(x, y, rawTile & lowMask, rawTile & flagsMask)
00152                 onRowEnd(y, w, h)
00153 
00154         onTilesEnd(left, top, right, bottom, w, h)
00155 
00156 
00157     def renderSummaryAsHtml(self):
00158 
00159         m = self.m
00160 
00161         out = [
00162             "<p>\n",
00163             """<b>Micropolis City Evaluation, %s</b><br/>\n""" % (
00164                 m.cityDate,
00165             ),
00166             "Score: %s, Changed: %s, Class: %s, Level: %s, Tax Rate: %s%%<br/>\n" % (
00167                 m.evalScore, m.evalChanged, m.evalCityClass, m.evalCityLevel, m.cityTax,
00168             ),
00169             "Demand: Residential: %s, Commercial: %s, Industrial: %s<br/>\n" % (
00170               m.resLast, m.comLast, m.indLast,
00171             ),
00172             "Funds: $%s, Assessed: %s, Population: %s, Delta: %s<br/>\n" % (
00173               m.totalFunds, m.evalAssessedDollars, m.evalPopulation, m.evalDelta,
00174             ),
00175             "Survey: Is the Mayor doing a good job? Yes: %s, No: %s<br/>" % (
00176               m.evalGoodYes, 100 - m.evalGoodYes,
00177             ),
00178             "</p>\n",
00179             "<hr/>\n",
00180         ]
00181 
00182         return "".join(out)
00183 
00184 
00185     def renderClippedTilesAsHtml(self):
00186 
00187         out = []
00188 
00189         def onTilesBegin(left, top, right, bottom, w, h):
00190 
00191             out.append(
00192                 """<style><!--
00193 .tile {
00194   width: 16px;
00195   height: 16px;
00196   background-image: url(http://localhost/micropolis/tiles/tiles.png)
00197 }
00198 </style>""")
00199 
00200             out.append(
00201                 """<div style="width: %dpx; height: %dpx">\n""" % (
00202                     w * 16,
00203                     h * 16,
00204                 ))
00205 
00206             out.append(
00207                 """<table gap="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"> <!-- Tiles: left %d top %d right %d bottom %d w %d h %d -->\n""" % (
00208                     left, top, right, bottom, w, h,
00209                 ))
00210 
00211         def onRowBegin(y, w, h):
00212             out.append(
00213                 """<tr height="16"> <!-- Row %d: --> """ % (
00214                     y,
00215                 ))
00216 
00217         def onTile(x, y, tile, flags):
00218             out.append(
00219                 """<td width="16" class="tile" style="background-position: %dpx %dpx"/>""" % (
00220                     -16 * (tile % 16),
00221                     -16 * (tile / 16),
00222                 ))
00223 
00224         def onRowEnd(y, w, h):
00225             out.append(
00226                 """<tr/>\n""")
00227 
00228         def onTilesEnd(left, top, right, bottom, w, h):
00229 
00230             out.append(
00231                 """</table>\n""")
00232 
00233             out.append(
00234                 """</div>\n""")
00235 
00236         self.applyToClippedTiles(
00237             onTilesBegin,
00238             onRowBegin,
00239             onTile,
00240             onRowEnd,
00241             onTilesEnd)
00242 
00243         return "".join(out)

00249 
00250 class MicropolisHTTPRequestHandler(BaseHTTPServer.BaseHTTPRequestHandler):
00251 
00252     server_version = "MicropolisHTTP/" + __version__
00253 
00254     def __init__(
00255             self,
00256             *args,
00257             **params):
00258 
00259         print "__INIT__ MicropolisHTTPRequestHandler", "SELF", self, "ARGS", args, "PARAMS", params
00260 
00261         BaseHTTPServer.BaseHTTPRequestHandler.__init__(
00262             self,
00263             *args,
00264             **params)
00265 
00266 
00267     def do_GET(self):
00268         """Serve a GET request."""
00269         path = self.path
00270         print "do_GET", self, "path", path
00271 
00272         server = self.server
00273         m = server.m
00274         view = server.view
00275 
00276         now = time.time()
00277         fracTime = now - math.floor(now)
00278         m.flagBlink = fracTime < 0.5
00279 
00280         m.sim_tick()
00281         m.animateTiles()
00282 
00283         content = (
00284             """<html><head><title>Micropolis</title></head><body>\n""" +
00285             view.renderSummaryAsHtml() +
00286             view.renderClippedTilesAsHtml() +
00287             """\n</body><html>"""
00288         )
00289 
00290         self.send_response(200)
00291 
00292         contentType = "text/html"
00293         self.send_header("Content-Type", contentType)
00294 
00295         contentLength = len(content)
00296         self.send_header("Content-Length", str(contentLength))
00297 
00298         self.end_headers()
00299 
00300         f = self.wfile
00301         f.write(content)
00302         f.flush()
00303

00308 
00309 class MicropolisHTTPServer(BaseHTTPServer.HTTPServer):
00310 
00311 
00312     def __init__(
00313             self,
00314             *args,
00315             **params):
00316 
00317         print "__INIT__ MicropolisHTTPServer", "SELF", self, "ARGS", args, "PARAMS", params
00318 
00319         BaseHTTPServer.HTTPServer.__init__(
00320             self,
00321             *args,
00322             **params)
00323 
00324         m = micropolisengine.Micropolis()
00325         self.m = m
00326         print "Created Micropolis simulator engine:", m
00327 
00328         m.resourceDir = 'res'
00329         m.initGame()
00330 
00331         if False:
00332             # Load a city file.
00333             path = os.path.basename(__file__)
00334             path = os.path.abspath(os.path.join(path, "../cities"))
00335             cityFileName = path + os.sep + 'haight.cty'
00336             print "Loading city file:", cityFileName
00337             m.loadFile(cityFileName)
00338 
00339             # Initialize the simulator engine.
00340             m.resume()
00341             m.setSpeed(2)
00342             m.setPasses(1000)
00343             m.setFunds(1000000000)
00344             m.autoGoto = 0
00345             m.cityTax = 12
00346 
00347         view = MicropolisView(m)
00348         self.view = view
00349

00354 def test(HandlerClass = MicropolisHTTPRequestHandler,
00355          ServerClass = MicropolisHTTPServer):
00356     print "Starting web server:", HandlerClass, ServerClass
00357     BaseHTTPServer.test(HandlerClass, ServerClass)
00358 
00359 
00360 if __name__ == '__main__':
00361     test()
